redist 2.0.4

Reference

redist-package

Markov Chain Monte Carlo Methods for Redistricting Simulation

Prepare

Helper functions to prepare a redistricting simulation.

redist_map() as_redist_map()

Create a redist_map object.

get_existing()

Extract the existing district assignment from a redist_map object

get_graph()

Extract the adjacency graph from a redist_map object

is_contiguous()

Check that a redist_map object is contiguous

merge_by()

Merge map units

plot(<redist_map>)

Plot a redist_map

redist.identify.cores() make_cores()

Identify Cores of a District (Heuristic)

Simulate

Core functions to perform a redistricting simulation.

redist_smc()

SMC Redistricting Sampler

redist.mcmc()

MCMC Redistricting Simulator

get_sampling_info()

Extract the sampling information from a redistricting simulation

redist.combine()

Combine successive runs of redist.mcmc

redist.combine.anneal()

redist.combine.anneal

redist.crsg()

Redistricting via Compact Random Seed and Grow Algorithm

redist.enumpart()

Enumerate All Parititions

redist.ipw()

Inverse probability reweighting for MCMC Redistricting

redist.mcmc.anneal()

MCMC Redistricting Simulator using Simulated Annealing

redist.rsg()

Redistricting via Random Seed and Grow Algorithm

redist.smc()

SMC Redistricting Sampler

Analyze

Functions to analyze the results of a redistricting simulation.

add_reference()

Add a reference plan to a set of plans

get_plan_matrix() as.matrix(<redist_plans>)

Extract the matrix of district assignments from a redistricting simulation

get_plan_weights()

Extract the sampling weights from a redistricting simulation

imp_confint()

Confidence Intervals for Importance Sampling Estimates

pullback()

Pull back plans to unmerged units

redist.compactness() distr_compactness()

Calculate compactness measures for a set of districts

redist.distances()

Compute Distance between Partitions

redist.group.percent() group_frac()

Calculate Group Percent by District

redist.metrics()

Calculate gerrymandering metrics for a set of districts

redist_plans

A set of redistricting plans

subset_sampled() subset_ref()

Subset to sampled or reference draws

Visualize

Functions to plot redistricting plans and the results of a simulation.

plot(<redist_map>)

Plot a redist_map

plot(<redist_plans>)

Summary plots for redist_plans

plot_distr_qtys()

Plot sorted box and whisker plots

plot_hist() hist(<redist_plans>)

Plot a histogram of a summary statistic

plot_plan()

Plot a district assignment

redist.group_viz()

Visualize Plans and Their Treatment of Groups

redist.map()

Creates a map with optional graph overlay

redist.prep_group_viz()

Prepare to Visualize Plans

Other Functions

algdat.p10

All Partitions of 25 Precincts into 3 Congressional Districts (10% Population Constraint)

algdat.p20

All Partitions of 25 Precincts into 3 Congressional Districts (20% Population Constraint)

algdat.pfull

All Partitions of 25 Precincts into 3 Congressional Districts (No Population Constraint)

as.matrix(<redist>)

Extract the redistricting matrix from a redist object

fl25

Florida 25 Precinct File

fl250

Florida 250 Precinct File

fl70

Florida 70 Precinct File

preproc.adj()

Preprocess adjacency arguments

preproc.shp()

Preprocess shapefile arguments

redist-package

Markov Chain Monte Carlo Methods for Redistricting Simulation

redist.adjacency()

Adjacency List functionality for redist

redist.calc.frontier.size()

Calculate Frontier Size

redist.choropleth()

Creates a Choropleth

redist.combine.mpi()

Combine successive runs of redist.mcmc.mpi

redist.competitiveness()

Compute Competitiveness

redist.county.id()

Create County IDs

redist.county.relabel()

Relabel Discontinuous Counties

redist.diagplot()

Diagnostic plotting functionality for MCMC redistricting.

redist.enumerate()

Exact Redistricting Plan Enumerator

redist.find.target()

Find Majority Minority Remainder

redist.findparams()

Run parameter testing for redist.mcmc

redist.init.enumpart()

Initialize enumpart

redist.mcmc.mpi()

MCMC Redistricting Simulator using MPI

redist.parity()

Calculates Population Parity

redist.prep.enumpart()

Prepares a run of the enumpart algorithm by ordering edges

redist.random.subgraph()

Return a random subgraph of a shape

redist.read.enumpart()

Read Results from enumpart

redist.reduce.adjacency()

Reduce Adjacency List

redist.run.enumpart()

Runs the enumpart algorithm

redist.samplepart()

Sample partitions using spanning trees

redist.segcalc()

Segregation index calculation for MCMC redistricting.

redist.smc_is_ci()

Confidence Intervals for Importance Sampling Estimates

redist.splits()

Count County Splits

redist.subset()

Subset a shp

redist.subset_bounds()

Calculate Population Bounds for a Subset of a Map

redist_quantile_trunc()

Helper function to truncate importance weights
